title: tikv panic when update config online for “raftstore.periodic-full-compact-start-times”
body:
## Bug Report

<!-- Thanks for your bug report! Don't worry if you can't fill out all the sections. -->

### What version of TiKV are you using?
TiKV 
Release Version:   8.2.0-alpha
Edition:           Community
Git Commit Hash:   fba1fb2f65620b7ab1c03a9cf918ef3968969398
Git Commit Branch: heads/refs/tags/v8.2.0-alpha
UTC Build Time:    2024-05-23 11:38:52
Rust Version:      rustc 1.77.0-nightly (89e2160c4 2023-12-27)
Enable Features:   memory-engine pprof-fp jemalloc mem-profiling portable sse test-engine-kv-rocksdb test-engine-raft-raft-engine trace-async-tasks openssl-vendored
Profile:           dist_release

### What operating system and CPU are you using?
8c/32g

### Steps to reproduce
1、set config tikv `raftstore.periodic-full-compact-start-times`='["12:00 +0800","14:00 +0800"]';

### What did you expect?
no panic

### What did happened?
tikv panic when update config online for “raftstore.periodic-full-compact-start-times”

`{"level":"FATAL","log":"[lib.rs:477] [\"internal error: entered unreachable code\"] [backtrace=\"   0: tikv_util::set_panic_hook::{{closure}}\\n             at </details>

Panicked on this line:

https://github.com/tikv/tikv/blob/fba1fb2f65620b7ab1c03a9cf918ef3968969398/src/config/mod.rs#L4654

The config `raftstore.periodic-full-compact-start-times` is a ReadableSchedule, which occupies the variant `ConfigValue::Schedule` which `to_change_value()` cannot handle.


The function `to_change_value()` also forget to handle `OffsetTime`. I suggest changing it to

```rust
match self {
   ...
   ConfigValue::OffsetTime(_) => v.parse::<ReadableOffsetTime>()?.into(),
   ConfigValue::Schedule(_) => v.parse::<ReadableSchedule>()?.into(),
   ConfigValue::Module(_) | ConfigValue::Skip | ConfigValue::None => unreachable!(),
}
```

and stop using the catch-all branch `_ =>` so the exhaustive check can properly flag the missing case.
